snippet: Oil prices were trading near its low for the year after a decision by OPEC not to cut production. Airlines rose on the prospect of lower fuel costs.
abstract: Steep drop in oil price sends stocks down.
lead_paragraph: Oil prices were trading near its low for the year after a decision by OPEC not to cut production. Airlines rose on the prospect of lower fuel costs.

headline.main: Energy Shares Lead a Decline in the Market
headline.print_headline: Another Steep Drop in Oil Drags Down the Market
